sentences.english: Objective:To evaluate the efficacy and safty of zinc pyrithione spray against psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价吡啶硫锌气雾剂治疗银屑病的疗效和安全性。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanisms of ultraviolet blood irradiation and oxygenation (UBIO) for psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究紫外线照射充氧自血回输治疗银屑病的机制。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of artesunate in topical treatment on mice's psoriasis like animal model.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究青蒿琥酯外用对银屑病样小鼠模型的影响。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the curative effect of treating psoriasis guttate with tanshinone.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价丹参酮治疗点滴型银屑病的疗效。

sentences.english: Patients with guttate, erythrodermic, or pustular psoriasis were excluded.
sentences.chinese: 与点滴状，红皮，或脓疱性银屑病患者被排除在外。

sentences.english: The disease severity was evaluated by psoriasis area and severity index ( PASI).
sentences.chinese: PASI评分法评估银屑病的严重程度。

sentences.english: So a diagnosis of disseminated superficial porokeratosis complicated by psoriasis vulgaris was made.
sentences.chinese: 文中对银屑病并发汗孔角化病的可能原因进行了讨论。

sentences.english: Why do psoriasis patients have such a high rate of associated co-morbidities?
sentences.chinese: 为什么银屑病患者会有如此高发生率的相关共患病？

sentences.english: This review introduces the present study state of the psoriasis evoked by streptococcal infection.
sentences.chinese: 本文就链球菌感染诱发银屑病的研究现状作一综述。

sentences.english: The aforesaid series of studies shows that psoriasis is a psychosomatic disease.
sentences.chinese: 这一系列研究表明银屑病是典型的心身疾病。

sentences.english: Sometimes, psoriatic arthritis is incorrectly diagnosed as gout or can even be associated with gout.
sentences.chinese: 有时，银屑病关节炎被误诊为痛风或甚至与痛风有关。

sentences.english: Conclusion Microcirculation of patients with blood stasis syndrome of psoriasis has been obviously improved by Tongdaosan.
sentences.chinese: 结论通导散能够有效改善血瘀型银屑病患者的微循环。

sentences.english: Conclu-sions LXHXC has good efficiency in treating psoriasis of the blood-heat type.
sentences.chinese: 结论凉血活血胶囊治疗血热型银屑病有较好的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effect of Yinxieling capsule on patients with Psoriasis vulgaris.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察银屑灵胶囊治疗寻常型银屑病的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Psoriatic arthritis generally affects the most distant joints of the fingers and toes.
sentences.chinese: 银屑病关节炎通常影响手指和脚趾最远端的关节。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the situation of cell apoptosis in psoriatic skin.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价银屑病皮肤中细胞凋亡的情况。

definition: rosacea (dermatological condition of the face and nose)/brandy nose
